name: Dark Horizon (Skill)
text: If you take a total of 2000 or more damage, you can use this Skill on your next turn. Play 1 "Dark Magician Girl" from your Deck. If you took 2500 or more damage on your previous turn, you can play 1 "Dark Magician" from your Deck instead. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
